creator: roytman@smart.net
text:
There is no way to set certain Parser/DOMBuilder features via JAXP
for example "http://apache.org/xml/features/dom/defer-node-expansion" which I 
need badly.
I thought DOMBuilderFactory.setAttribute() was meant to do so but it is not 
implemented (trows exception) and code which actually instantiate DOMParser 
does not check attributes.

creator: roytman@smart.net
text:
Please look into it. It is a very little fix but it does not let me to finish 
migrating my software to JAXP

I too have run into this limitation. 

Are we waiting on the JAXP committee to standardize these attributes before
implementation of this method can proceed? Or is it a matter of developer 
time to implement the feature? I might be able to help on the latter, but 
not the former. :^)
creator: nboyd@atg.com

text:
Fixed in next version Xerces 1.4.1.  Code still needs to be tested and 
integrated into Xerces 2.x.
creator: edwingo@apache.org
